Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Wow, what an incredible leap! Ksori finishes the first round in 25.13 seconds, taking first place! Close behind is Mr. Kaiji's dog, Little Phym, at 33.01 seconds in second place!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "Alright, let's take a short intermission. The second half of the competition begins in 10 minutes. Don't miss it!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'How does it feel, competing in an official event?', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Mm, Ksori's still as amazing as ever.", 4: '1'}
{3: "She strokes Ksori's head with affectionate pride. Meanwhile, the dog trots in circles around you, occasionally nudging your hand-held terminal with her damp nose."}

{3: "It's been some time since the practice competition. Through the slow rhythm of daily life, the bond between the three of you—two people and a dog—has only grown deeper. And now, the day of the real competition has arrived."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Even though the first half went well, I'm still a little worried...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'His so-called charity work is just for show. What he really wants is to use it as advertising for his council campaign.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "He's desperate for attention, doing everything he can to make sure his dog wins first place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "But he never expected the Gray Raven Commandant to enter the competition... and just like that, the media's attention shifted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "And to steal the spotlight back, he's willing to stoop so low...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A flicker of shadow crosses her face as she recalls what happened a few days ago.'}
{2: 'If we could find proof of his cheating, we might be able to expose him.', 3: '38'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Hm... Whatever the case, if he dares hurt Ksori...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'Ladies and gentlemen, the intermission is ending. Trainers and their dogs, please prepare and follow me to the venue for the second half of the competition.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'This next set of facilities was sponsored and modified by Mr. Kaiji—', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'A new venue with fresh challenges and new opportunities!', 4: '18'}
{3: 'As the indoor lights come on, the crowd is met with the sight of a long waterway stretching before them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'A brand-new venue, and they tell us only two minutes before the start?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trainer 1', 3: "Mr. Kaiji, what's going on?! We've had no time to practice these new events!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trainer 2', 3: "What the hell, Kaiji? You think a dog can learn this in one minute? Where's the event coordinator? Is no one going to do something?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veterinarian', 3: "Tch, the coordinator's out on business... We can't reach him right now...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kaiji', 3: 'Please, everyone, calm down. I understand your worries, but in real rescue work, you have to expect unfamiliar environments!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kaiji', 3: "None of the dogs have been trained for this, so everyone's starting from scratch—it's a fair contest!", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "That's the end of Mr. Kaiji's introduction. Now, I'll present the new competition venue, which features three events: water rescue, spice search, and maze exploration!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Water... spice... All connected to Ksori's past trauma.", 3: '81'}
{3: "Discord instinctively shields Ksori's face from the sight of the water pool ahead."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "...The competition doesn't matter. What matters is Ksori. I won't let her get hurt again just for the sake of a match...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Surprisingly, Ksori slips past Discord's hands, barking excitedly, as if she's itching to leap forward."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "...I think she's spotted the rescue dummy on the far side of the pool. She wants to save it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Alright, Ksori. If you want to try, we'll be with you the whole way. I'll guide you through, and 【kuroname】 will watch from a distance and map our route.", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "And now, as expected of Mr. Kaiji's dog—tackling this brand-new challenge in just 3 minutes, 3.41 seconds! That's two full minutes ahead of second place, putting it back at the top!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Host', 3: 'Next up, our final competitor—Ksori! Trainers and dog, take your positions. Ready... go!', 4: '18'}
{3: 'Ksori follows Discord into the water, but then panic seizes her. She thrashes in place, sending up frantic splashes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "What's going on? The fearless Ksori has completely frozen after getting into the water!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Host', 3: "And Miss Discord isn't pushing forward—she's staying right there with the dog! That's valuable time slipping away!", 4: '18'}

{3: 'She ignores the clock overhead, making no attempt to force Ksori forward. Instead, Discord stays beside the dog, calming her in a gentle voice, playfully splashing water over her back like the day the three of you spent together at the puddle.'}
{3: "For both people and animals alike, healing from trauma takes time. Ksori's reaction here is something she has expected."}
{3: 'And to both you and Discord, Ksori herself is worth far more than whatever the scoreboard says.'}
{2: 'Come on, Ksori!', 3: '166', 4: "You've got this, Discord!", 5: '166', 6: 'You can do it!', 7: '166'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Looks like Ksori's settling down... that's more like it! It's moving now, right behind Miss Discord—", 4: '18'}
{3: 'Step by step, she rises from the tide that once dragged her under, breaking free from the memories that tried to hold her there.'}
{3: 'Finding balance, pushing forward, searching for the target... Ksori finds her rhythm and completes the first event to a wave of applause.'}
{3: 'In the last two challenges, Ksori continues to live up to expectations, running alongside Discord and finishing the competition in style...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: 'Now for the results: First place—Little Phym, total time 3 minutes, 36.42 seconds. Second place—Ksori, total time 4 minutes, 1.37 seconds. Third place...', 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Let's congratulate Mr. Kaiji and his dog!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Kaiji', 3: "Thank you, thank you everyone! I appreciate your support, and I hope you'll all keep following our charity work. Next up—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trainer 1', 3: "Mr. Kaiji, you swapped out the events and had your own dog practice them in advance, didn't you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trainer 2', 3: 'Kaiji, you just made all our practice go to waste. What do you take us for?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Trainer 3', 3: 'My dog choked on water! How are you going to take responsibility for that?', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Host', 3: "Please, everyone, calm down. Mr. Kaiji was only trying to bring in some real rescue scenarios. This competition doesn't fully reflect a rescue dog's abilities!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kaiji', 3: "That's right, I've seen the hard work of all the trainers and dogs. This award ceremony is just a formality—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The crowd grows angry. Kaiji, flustered, is surrounded on the platform but refuses to admit anything.'}
{2: 'Event Manager', 3: 'Mr. Kaiji, we regret to inform you that you and your dog have been disqualified from the competition.'}
{3: 'Kaiji turns in disbelief as three people approach.'}
{3: "Half an hour earlier, after Ksori finished the course, you slipped into the exam room to collect evidence of Kaiji's violations."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veterinarian', 3: 'Kaiji, while the manager was away, you used your status as a sponsor to change the competition venue without permission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veterinarian', 3: "Do you know how many dogs nearly drowned because they weren't used to the water? And how many fainted from allergic reactions to those spices?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the exam room, over a dozen dogs lay receiving emergency treatment, while several veterinarians worked to save them.'}
{3: "You persuaded them to join you in reporting Kaiji's misconduct. Seeing the dogs collapsed because of his greed and vanity, the veterinarians agreed immediately."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kaiji', 3: 'No, no... I put in sponsorship money—at least let my dog win the title—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Soft fabric presses against you, along with the brush of her slender wrists and smooth hair.'}
{3: "She doesn't hear what you say, murmuring to herself as she keeps making adjustments, completely absorbed in her work."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'The waistline still needs shortening... and the back...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly trims the outfit in her hands, then takes a small step back, looking at you with satisfaction.'}
{3: "Now that the blue-haired girl has pulled herself out of her intense focus, you finally get the chance to ask the question that's been on your mind."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Yes. The prize for the ceremony was a box of dog treats and paw-themed formal outfits, one for the dog and two for the trainers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "But because of Kaiji's meddling, the ceremony was canceled.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Ksori gave everything she had during training and in the competition. More importantly, she overcame her fears.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I think she deserves to be honored... and so do we, as her trainers.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The brown-and-white dog runs out from the room, circling you and Discord, her tail wagging high.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'And for the formal outfits for us trainers, I want to tailor each to our own measurements.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It seems the term "formal outfit" has sparked a certain competitiveness in this seamstress, which is probably why she was measuring and cutting so intently earlier.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Alright, Commandant, it's time to see Ksori off.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The setting sun stretches its golden light across the sky, drawing out these moments of happiness.'}

{3: 'The last day of the Paw Guardian event is also the day you and Discord will say goodbye to Ksori. With the competition over, qualified dogs will officially become search-and-rescue dogs, joining disaster relief efforts.'}
{3: 'Wearing the rescue uniform Discord sewed for her by hand, Ksori hops and bounces among the other dogs, her brown-and-white fur gleaming in the sunset.'}
{3: 'The evening breeze lifts strands of her hair as she gazes at the golden sky, speaking softly.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Ksori doesn't fear humans anymore, or other dogs... and she no longer flinches at water or those scents from the past...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "This training journey let both of us face who we used to be through our wounds. It's been her redemption... and mine.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "【kuroname】, thank you for becoming Ksori's trainer with me. You gave a once-stray dog a home, and you let me complete my own redemption.", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's really thanks to your own choices.", 3: '335'}
{2: "It's thanks to your will to fight, and to change.", 3: '337'}
{2: "It's those choices that shape who we are.", 3: '339'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Maybe facing the past and changing isn't so scary after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Because you and Ksori made me believe someone will always be waiting for me to move forward.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her gaze from the blue sky and looks affectionately at you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Oh, isn't that Ksori—and trainers Miss Discord and Commandant 【kuroname】?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "The Paw Guardian event has officially ended. We're taking commemorative photos of all the trainers and dogs. Would you like to join?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hearing her name, the dog runs over, tail wagging, bouncing happily at your side.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: 'Alright, everyone, get into position—', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: 'You two, stand closer together!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Female Staff Member A', 3: "Closer still. You won't both fit in the frame like that.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'The warm evening breeze brushes against her flushed cheeks, deepening the color.'}
{3: 'Even if you both call yourselves trainers, the quiet feelings between you have already begun to blur that line.'}
{3: 'Her hand is slender and cool. These are the hands that have held weapons, cooked meals for you, and sewn new clothes...'}
{3: 'She hesitates for only a moment before firmly returning your grip. Perhaps the threads of fate have already bound you together.'}
{3: "She doesn't hesitate. As the distance between you closes, she naturally slips her arm through yours."}
{3: 'Her fingers are slender and cool. These are the fingers that have held weapons, cooked meals for you, and sewn new clothes...'}
{3: 'Without realizing it, those threads of fate have already bound you together.'}
{3: 'The camera captures the moment, freezing it in time—two people and a dog.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the staff hands the photo to you and Discord, the moment to part with Ksori draws near.'}
{3: 'Discord crouches down and holds Ksori tightly, then stands to encourage her to run ahead with the other dogs.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: '"Oh, where, oh, where, has my little dog gone? Oh where, oh where can he be?"', 4: '18', 18: '100011616'}
{3: 'Watching Ksori go, she hums a childhood rhyme.'}
{3: 'The melody lingers, carrying her blessing for Ksori, and for the self who once struggled in the mud.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In this imperfect world, pain and hardship may still remain, but she no longer fears them.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: '"With his ears cut short and his tail cut long."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The once-wounded girl and the little dog have both grown. From a broken world, they have pieced their souls back together, and now walk with those they cherish toward a place of light.'}
